text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: athAbravIn mahAvIryo droNas tattvArthadarzivAn
text.ur: athābravīn mahāvīryo droṇas tattvārthadarśivān

text.ascii: na tAdRzA vinazyanti nApi yAnti parAbhavam
text.ud: न तादृशा विनश्यन्ति नापि यान्ति पराभवम्
text.ur: na tādr̥śā vinaśyanti nāpi yānti parābhavam

text.ascii: zUrAz ca kRtavidyAz ca buddhimanto jitendriyAH
text.ur: śūrāś ca kr̥tavidyāś ca buddhimanto jitendriyāḥ

text.ascii: dharmajJAz ca kRtajJAz ca dharmarAjam anuvratAH
text.ur: dharmajñāś ca kr̥tajñāś ca dharmarājam anuvratāḥ

text.ascii: nItidharmArthatattvajJaM pitRvac ca samAhitam
text.ur: nītidharmārthatattvajñaṁ pitr̥vac ca samāhitam

text.ascii: dharme sthitaM satyadhRtiM jyeSThaM jyeSThApacAyinam
text.ur: dharme sthitaṁ satyadhr̥tiṁ jyeṣṭhaṁ jyeṣṭhāpacāyinam

text.ascii: anuvratA mahAtmAnaM bhrAtaraM bhrAtaro nRpa
text.ur: anuvratā mahātmānaṁ bhrātaraṁ bhrātaro nr̥pa

text.ascii: ajAtazatruM hrImantaM taM ca bhrAtqn anuvratam
text.ur: ajātaśatruṁ hrīmantaṁ taṁ ca bhrātr̥̄n anuvratam

text.ascii: teSAM tathA vidheyAnAM nibhRtAnAM mahAtmanAm
text.ur: teṣāṁ tathā vidheyānāṁ nibhr̥tānāṁ mahātmanām

text.ascii: kimarthaM nItimAn pArthaH zreyo naiSAM kariSyati
text.ur: kimarthaṁ nītimān pārthaḥ śreyo naiṣāṁ kariṣyati

text.ascii: tasmAd yatnAt pratIkSante kAlasyodayam Agatam
text.ur: tasmād yatnāt pratīkṣante kālasyodayam āgatam

text.ascii: na hi te nAzam Rccheyur iti pazyAmy ahaM dhiyA
text.ud: न हि ते नाशमृच्छेयुरिति पश्याम्यहं धिया
text.ur: na hi te nāśam r̥ccheyur iti paśyāmy ahaṁ dhiyā

text.ascii: sAMprataM caiva yat kAryaM tac ca kSipram akAlikam
text.ur: sāṁprataṁ caiva yat kāryaṁ tac ca kṣipram akālikam

text.ascii: kriyatAM sAdhu saMcintya vAsaz caiSAM pracintyatAm
text.ur: kriyatāṁ sādhu saṁcintya vāsaś caiṣāṁ pracintyatām

text.ascii: yathAvat pANDuputrANAM sarvArtheSu dhRtAtmanAm
text.ur: yathāvat pāṇḍuputrāṇāṁ sarvārtheṣu dhr̥tātmanām

text.ascii: durjJeyAH khalu zUrAs te apApAs tapasA vRtAH
text.ur: durjñeyāḥ khalu śūrās te apāpās tapasā vr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: zuddhAtmA guNavAn pArthaH satyavAn nItimAJ zuciH
text.ur: śuddhātmā guṇavān pārthaḥ satyavān nītimāñ śuciḥ

text.ascii: tejorAzir asaMkhyeyo gRhNIyAd api cakSuSI
text.ur: tejorāśir asaṁkhyeyo gr̥hṇīyād api cakṣuṣī

text.ascii: vijJAya kriyatAM tasmAd bhUyaz ca mRgayAmahe
text.ur: vijñāya kriyatāṁ tasmād bhūyaś ca mr̥gayāmahe

text.ascii: brAhmaNaiz cArakaiH siddhair ye cAnye tadvido janAH
text.ur: brāhmaṇaiś cārakaiḥ siddhair ye cānye tadvido janāḥ
